data.text: @TheTalkCBS No, a woman should also not be discriminated against regarding jobs and opportunities in life either. To me, this is the real issue for many women, my amazing female boss experienced this. I hope this is something we overcome when I grow older.
@TheTalkCBS Thank you  Madonna your a voice for all of us

@TheTalkCBS I heard that crap. That I’m supposed to suddenly stop being me because I’m 60. I shouldn’t have opinions, stop wearing heels, bake cookies and babysit grandkids. I beg to differ.I just learned how to curse and flip people off. Adding that to my female skills  #🌎domination👸🏽
@TheTalkCBS We Don’t Need her to do that look at Tina  Turner 👄💋💄💃🏾👠👙👡🥂

@TheTalkCBS Heck no, the fun is just starting.
You go Madonna!
@TheTalkCBS Heck no! There are boring 20 and 30 year olds. What does she have to do with anything? Live your life.
@TheTalkCBS Absolutely no. Ask #susanlucci #rachelwelch #sophialoren
WATCH: @MrsSOsbourne defends @Madonna over "ageism" remarks; Says #XFactor firing rumors are false https://t.co/YKyMtG6c67 https://t.co/zQik9m2KKB
@TheTalkCBS Not at All !!
@TheTalkCBS No, no, no

@TheTalkCBS Honestly, I adore her for this, I'm 31 and feel more confident and "me" than ever! You should always keep learning, exploring, living to the fullest. Don't worry about what others think- and sexy is an attitude! I want to be Betty White when I grow up. 😍💖 #EverybodyTalks

@TheTalkCBS I was carded (for real) for drinks on my 40th Bd.... now i'm 60 (& still 'vain'), wish i could turn back the clock, nothing is more unforgiving as 'time' it catches all of us, some later than others! ⏱on Madonna, she'll get U @ some point too!
@TheTalkCBS Go for it as long as you can!

@TheTalkCBS Madonna's right. But "40 is the new 30" is a recent concept. In my teens/early 20's, I thought 30 was the cutoff age 2 b adventurous. I admit that, at times, I still buy into the stupid double standards. I feel like if I call Trevor Noah "hot" I'm a creepy 40-something.
@TheTalkCBS At 40 most women are finally reaching the point were they can become their main priority, besides a woman is just reaching their sexual peak.

@TheTalkCBS I'm heading to 55th bday in May - I refuse to act/accept my age! I still go to concerts like Korn, I don't care if I don't fit in, I'm OG don't f%©k wit me! If ya do I'll get my son to take care of it! Age is a state of mind! Sharon gives me the ok to be as naughty as I want! Lol
@BarbaraEASmith1 @TheTalkCBS Very true, that is why it is goid too see their maturity and hear what they went through to get where they are at
@TheTalkCBS Don't you mean past the age of 50 or 60? 😉
@TheTalkCBS After 40 is when the real fun begins!!
@TheTalkCBS No way...life begins to be fun and interesting at 40, 50, 60 and etc.
@TheTalkCBS Absolutely NOT! Being young isn’t a number, it’s a way of life! 🤷🏻‍♀️💗
@TheTalkCBS No,  you can't stop getting older but you can still have fun living your life. after 40 age ain't nothing but a number.
@TheTalkCBS Absolutely not. 😊👍
@TheTalkCBS No
@TheTalkCBS Still sexy and fun at 66

@TheTalkCBS No way! I actually find women over 40 more interesting, they have all the best stories. 
#EverybodyTalks
@TheTalkCBS I'm 43 and my life is way better than ever........divorced, doing Stand Up and I've taken a lover #Giddyup #Exhausted #EverybodyTalks
@TheTalkCBS No 💯✌🏾
